data.name: Rotten Apple - New York Fallen
data.detailed_description:
*This Game is designed specifically for VR Arcades*

Rotten Apple - New York Fallen is an immersive free-roam co-op adventure for up to 4 players taking you through post-apocalyptic New York. What started off as a routine patrol for your squad takes a sudden turn when an emergency call from deep in the quarantine zone requires you to enter. With only 30 minutes left before the whole city is bombed, the clock is ticking to save anything that's left of the missing research team.

  • Built for Free-roam: Wander through levels untethered with your team immersing yourself in the post-apocalyptic world

  • Easy Game Management: Manage your players experience with the help of our easy to use Game-Master GUI

  • Multiple Enemy Types: No one knows what really lurks in the quarantine zone, can your team hold them off?

  • Built In Riddles: Is your team good under pressure? We hope so. Keep an eye on your teammates back while they solve post-apocalyptic challenges.

  • Realistic Weapon Handling: Multiple Weapons and realistic reloading - make sure you learn to reload fast to fend off the horde!

data.short_description: Since the outbreak, New York has been turned into an isolated quarantine zone. You and your squad are just on the way to guard the quarantine zone border when an unexpected emergency call forces you to enter. Those who enter the quarantine zone rarely return. Can you and your team survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence, Gore
